title: LINCS Phase II MCF10A Common Project
description: As a pilot study for the LINCS MCF 10A Common Project, the dose-dependent sensitivity of a common isolate of the nonmalignant breast cell line MCF 10A was assayed independently by 4 of the LINCS Data and Signature Generation Centers by measuring cell counts or by estimating proliferation using the CellTiter-GloÂ® assay 72 hours after treatment with each of 8 small molecule inhibitors across a 9-point dose range.
